00027 #ifdef _WIN32

00062 template <class Alloc = std::allocator<detail::digit_t>, bool Threadsafe = true,
00063     bool Secure = false>
00064 class nothrow_integer_t: public detail::digitmanager_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,
00065     Secure>, public any_integer
00066 {
00067     public:
00068     typedef nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> type;
00069 
00072     nothrow_integer_t();
00073     nothrow_integer_t(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& b,
00074         bool force_thread_safety = false);
00075     nothrow_integer_t(BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(type) b): any_integer(*this, 1) {
00076         _swap(b); }
00077     explicit nothrow_integer_t(const char *str, size_t base = 10);
00078     explicit nothrow_integer_t(const char *str, char **endptr, size_t base =
00079         10);
00080     explicit nothrow_integer_t(const std::string& str, size_t base = 10);
00081     explicit nothrow_integer_t(const xint::binary_t b, size_t bits = 0);
00082     explicit nothrow_integer_t(const any_integer& other, bool
00083         force_thread_safety = false);
00084     template <typename Type> nothrow_integer_t(const Type n,
00085         typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type* = 0);
00086 
00087     #ifndef BOOST_XINT_DOXYGEN_IGNORE
00088 
00089     nothrow_integer_t(const detail::data_t c): detail::digitmanager_t<Alloc,
00090         Threadsafe, Secure>(*c.holder()), any_integer(*this, c.length,
00091         c.negative) { data.beginendmod(); }
00092     nothrow_integer_t(const detail::nan_t& c): detail::digitmanager_t<Alloc,
00093         Threadsafe, Secure>(0), any_integer(*this, 0) { }
00094     #endif

00170     static nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> nan() { return _nan; }

00172         random_by_size(Type& gen, size_t size_in_bits, bool high_bit_on = false,
00173         bool low_bit_on = false, bool can_be_negative = false);

00176         no_callback);
00178 
00179     void _swap(nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& s) { using
00180         std::swap; swap(data, s.data); }
00181     static std::string _nan_text() { return "#NaN#"; }
00182 
00183     private:
00184     static nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> _nan;
00185     BOOST_XINT_COPYABLE_AND_MOVABLE(type)
00186 };

00188 template <class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00189 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00190     Threadsafe, Secure>::_nan = nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(
00191     detail::nan_t());

00197 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00198 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::nothrow_integer_t():
00199     any_integer(*this, 1)
00200 {
00201     // Don't need to do anything, already preinitialized to zero.
00202 }
00203 
00205 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00206 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::nothrow_integer_t(const
00207     nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& b, bool force_thread_safety):
00208     any_integer(*this, 1)
00209 {
00210     try {
00211         data = b.data;
00212         if (!is_nan()) {
00213             data.beginendmod();
00214             if (force_thread_safety && Threadsafe == false) data.make_unique();
00215         }
00216     } catch (std::exception&) {
00217         *this = nan();
00218     }
00219 }
00220 
00222 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00223 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::nothrow_integer_t(const char *str,
00224     size_t base): any_integer(*this, 1)
00225 {
00226     try {
00227         data.from_string(str, strlen(str), base);
00228     } catch (std::exception&) {
00229         *this = nan();
00230     }
00231 }
00232

00238     try {

00250     try {
00251         data.from_string(str.c_str(), str.length(), base);

00253         *this = nan();

00258 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00259 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::nothrow_integer_t(const
00260     xint::binary_t b, size_t bits): any_integer(*this, 1)
00261 {
00262     try {
00263         data.from_binary(b, bits);
00264     } catch (std::exception&) {
00265         *this = nan();
00266     }
00267 }
00268 
00270 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00271 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::nothrow_integer_t(const
00272     any_integer& c, bool): any_integer(*this, 1)
00273 {
00274     if (c._data().is_nan()) {
00275         *this = nan();
00276     } else {
00277         try {
00278             data.duplicate_data(c._data());
00279         } catch (std::exception&) {
00280             *this = nan();
00281         }
00282     }
00283 }
00284 
00297 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00298 template <typename Type> nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,
00299     Secure>::nothrow_integer_t(const Type n, typename
00300     boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type*): any_integer(*this, 1)
00301 {
00302     try {
00303         if (std::numeric_limits<Type>::is_signed) data.set_signed(n);
00304         else data.set_unsigned(n);
00305     } catch (std::exception&) {
00306         *this = nan();
00307     }
00308 }
00309 
00310 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00311 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00312     Threadsafe, Secure>::operator=(BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(type) c)
00313 {
00314     try {
00315         data = c.data;
00316         if (!is_nan()) data.beginendmod();
00317     } catch (std::exception&) {
00318         *this = nan();
00319     }
00320     return *this;
00321 }
00322 
00324 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00325 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00326     Threadsafe, Secure>::operator-() const
00327 {
00328     try {
00329         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00330         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(-data);
00331         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00332     } catch (std::exception&) {
00333         return nan();
00334     }
00335 }
00336 
00338 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00339 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00340     Threadsafe, Secure>::operator+=(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,
00341     Secure> b)
00342 {
00343     try {
00344         if (!is_nan() && !b.is_nan()) data += b.data;
00345         else *this = nan();
00346     } catch (std::exception&) {
00347         *this = nan();
00348     }
00349     return *this;
00350 }

00569 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00570 bool nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::is_odd() const {
00571     try {
00572         return (is_nan() ? false : data.is_odd());
00573     } catch (std::exception&) {
00574         return false;
00575     }
00576 }

00587         return false;

00600         return (is_nan() ? 0 : data.sign(signed_zero));

00602         return 0;

00620 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00621 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00622     Threadsafe, Secure>::pow2(size_t exponent)
00623 {
00624     try {
00625         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00626         detail::pow2(r.data, exponent);
00627         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00628     } catch (std::exception&) {
00629         return nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::nan();
00630     }

00636     Threadsafe, Secure>::factorial(size_t n)
00637 {

00640         detail::factorial(r.data, n);
00641         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00642     } catch (std::exception&) {
00643         return nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::nan();

00648 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00649 template <class Type>
00650 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00651     Threadsafe, Secure>::random_by_size(Type& gen, size_t size_in_bits, bool
00652     high_bit_on, bool low_bit_on, bool can_be_negative)
00653 {
00654     try {
00655         detail::random_generator<Type> rgen(gen);
00656 
00657         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00658         detail::random_by_size(r._data(), rgen, size_in_bits, high_bit_on,
00659             low_bit_on, can_be_negative);
00660         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00661     } catch (std::exception&) {
00662         return nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::nan();
00663     }
00664 }

00667 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00668 template <class Type>
00669 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00670     Threadsafe, Secure>::random_prime(Type& gen, size_t size_in_bits, callback_t
00671     callback)
00672 {
00673     try {
00674         detail::random_generator<Type> rgen(gen);
00675 
00676         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00677         detail::random_prime(r._data(), rgen, size_in_bits, callback);
00678         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00679     } catch (std::exception&) {
00680         return nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::nan();
00681     }
00682 }

00691 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00692 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> abs(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00693     Threadsafe, Secure> n)
00694 {
00695     try {
00696         if (n.is_nan()) return n;
00697         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(abs(n._data()));
00698         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00699     } catch (std::exception&) {
00700         return n.nan();
00701     }
00702 }
00703 
00708 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00709 typename nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::divide_t divide(const
00710     nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> dividend, const
00711     nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> divisor)
00712 {
00713     try {
00714         if (dividend.is_nan() || divisor.is_nan())
00715             return std::make_pair(dividend.nan(), dividend.nan());
00716         typename nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::divide_t r;
00717         divide(r.quotient._data(), r.remainder._data(), dividend._data(),
00718             divisor._data());
00719         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00720     } catch (std::exception&) {
00721         return std::make_pair(dividend.nan(), dividend.nan());
00722     }
00723 }
00725 
00728 
00730 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00731 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> square(const nothrow_integer_t<
00732     Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n)
00733 {
00734     try {
00735         if (n.is_nan()) return n;
00736         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00737         square(r._data(), n._data());
00738         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00739     } catch (std::exception&) {
00740         return n.nan();
00741     }
00742 }

00745 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00746 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> pow(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
00747     Threadsafe, Secure> n, const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> e)
00748 {
00749     try {
00750         if (n.is_nan() || e.is_nan()) return n.nan();
00751         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00752         pow(r._data(), n._data(), e._data());
00753         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00754     } catch (std::exception&) {
00755         return n.nan();
00756     }
00757 }

00768         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);

00770         return n.nan();

00785         if (n.is_nan()) return Type(0);
00786         return to<Type>(n._data());

00788         return Type(0);

00797 std::string to_string(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n,
00798     size_t base = 10, bool uppercase = false)
00799 {
00800     try {
00801         if (n.is_nan()) return n._nan_text();
00802         return to_string(n._data(), base, uppercase);
00803     } catch (std::exception&) {
00804         return std::string();
00805     }

00906 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00907 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> mulmod(const nothrow_integer_t<
00908     Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n, const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,
00909     Secure> by, const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> modulus)
00910 {
00911     try {
00912         if (n.is_nan() || by.is_nan() || modulus.is_nan()) return n.nan();
00913         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00914         mulmod(r._data(), n._data(), by._data(), modulus._data());
00915         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00916     } catch (std::exception&) {
00917         return n.nan();
00918     }
00919 }

00981     callback = no_callback)
00982 {
00983     try {
00984         if (n.is_nan()) return -2;

00987         return -2;

01197 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
01198 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> gcd(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
01199     Threadsafe, Secure> num1, const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
01200     num2)
01201 {
01202     if (num1.is_nan() || num2.is_nan()) return num1.nan();
01203     try {
01204         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
01205         gcd(r._data(), num1._data(), num2._data());
01206         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01207     } catch (std::exception&) {
01208         return num1.nan();
01209     }
01210 }

01213 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
01214 nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> lcm(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
01215     Threadsafe, Secure> num1, const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
01216     num2)
01217 {
01218     if (num1.is_nan() || num2.is_nan()) return num1.nan();
01219     try {
01220         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
01221         lcm(r._data(), num1._data(), num2._data());
01222         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01223     } catch (std::exception&) {
01224         return num1.nan();
01225     }
01226 }

01232 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
01233 int compare(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n1, const
01234     nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n2, bool ignoresign = false)
01235 {
01236     if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return 2;
01237     try {
01238         return compare(n1._data(), n2._data(), ignoresign);
01239     } catch (std::exception&) {
01240         return 2;
01241     }
01242 }

01248 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
01249 size_t log2(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n) {
01250     try {
01251         return (n.is_nan() ? 0 : log2(n._data()));
01252     } catch (std::exception&) {
01253         return 0;
01254     }
01255 }

01260 #define BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(rtype, op) \
01261     template <class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure, typename N> \
01262     rtype op(const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n1, const N \
01263         n2) \
01264     { \
01265         return op(n1, nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n2)); \
01266     } \
01267     \
01268     template <typename N, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure> \
01269     rtype op(const N n1, const nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> \
01270         n2) \
01271     { \
01272         return op(nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n1), n2); \
01273     }
01274 
01275 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator<)
01276 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator>)
01277 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator<=)
01278 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator>=)
01279 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator==)
01280 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator!=)
01281 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(int, compare)
01282 
01285 #define BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(op) \
01286     template <class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure, typename N> \
01287     nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> op(const nothrow_integer_t< \
01288         Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n1, const N n2) \
01289     { \
01290         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(op(n1, \
01291             nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n2))); \
01292         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
01293     } \
01294     \
01295     template <typename N, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure> \
01296     nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> op(const N n1, const \
01297         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n2) \
01298     { \
01299         nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(op(nothrow_integer_t< \
01300             Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n1), n2)); \
01301         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
01302     }
01303 
01304 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(pow)
01305 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(mulmod)
01306 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(sqrmod)
01307 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(powmod)
01308 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(invmod)
01309 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(operator+)
01310 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(operator-)
01311 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(operator*)
01312 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(operator/)
01313 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(operator%)
01314 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(operator&)
01315 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(operator|)
01316 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(operator^)
01317 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(gcd)
01318 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(lcm)
01319 
01322 template <typename charT, typename traits, class Alloc, bool
01323     Threadsafe, bool Secure> inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>&
01324     operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT, traits>& out, const nothrow_integer_t<
01325     Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n)
01326 {
01327     if (n.is_nan()) return operator<<(out, n._nan_text());
01328     return operator<<(out, n._data());
01329 }
01330 
01331 template <typename charT, typename traits, class Alloc, bool
01332     Threadsafe, bool Secure> inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>&
01333     operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT, traits>& in, nothrow_integer_t<Alloc,
01334     Threadsafe, Secure>& n)
01335 {
01336     if (in.peek()=='#') {
01337         // Must be either #NaN# or an error
01338         char buffer[6];
01339 
01340         // These are efficient and safe, but MSVC complains about them anyway.
01341         //std::streamsize size=in.readsome(buffer, 5);
01342         //buffer[size]=0;
01343 
01344         // Replacing them with these.
01345         char *p = buffer, *pe = p + 5;
01346         while (p != pe) in >> *p++;
01347         *p = 0;
01348 
01349         std::string str(buffer);
01350 
01351         if (str == n._nan_text()) n = n.nan();
01352         else in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
01353         return in;
01354     } else {
01355         return operator>>(in, n._data());
01356     }
01357 }
01359 
01360 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
01361 inline void swap(nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& left,
01362     nothrow_integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& right)
01363 {
01364     left._swap(right);
01365 }
